entry.title: A new year and a new website!

link.title: A new year and a new website!

entry.summary: On the 12th of November I received an email from Blogger saying my blog was removed as someone had reported it for spam, this was shortly after a posted 4 reviews of non alcoholic beers, 2 of which I scored low. Maybe just a coincidence? I requested a review from Blogger but this was unsuccessful. Blogger is a free blogging tool from google and I am unable to contact them to find out exactly wh...
